frontmatter.title: Coding Interview Questions Part I - Reverse Int

markdownRemark.html:
This is the first in a series of posts dissecting typical coding interview questions. I will begin with a pretty simple one - reversing an integer.

def reverse_int(n): rev = 0 while num > 0: # n < 10 / 10 = 0 rev = rev * 10 # shift current rev to left to append digit rev = rev + (num % 10) # get last digit of num num = num / 10 # chop off last digit of num

Tracing a Call

reverse_int(492)

  1. Loop 1
    1. rev is 0
    2. rev is rev * 10 = 0
    3. rev is rev + (num % 10) = 2
    4. num = 49
  2. Loop 2
    1. revis rev * 10 = 20
    2. rev is rev + (num % 10) = 29
    3. num = 4
  3. Loop 3
    1. rev = rev * 10 = 290
    2. rev = rev + (num % 10) = 294
    3. num = 0
